about_the_game:
Kick-start your adventure with this Welcome Pack including the unique Audi R8 Spyder Motorfest Edition and 220,000 Crew Credits.

Crew Credits are the in-game currency to unlock vehicles and new customization items, including:
- Car parts: hood, front bumper, wheels, calipers, mirrors, rocker panel, spoiler, back bumper, interior
- Bike parts: headlight, seat, fairing, rims, swingarm, fork, mirrors, exhaust, rear light
- Vanity parts: smoke, nitro, underglow, window tint, horn, tires, roof
- Avatar parts: hat, helmet, glasses, shirt, hoodie, jacket, trousers, tracksuit, shorts, shoes, gloves, racing suit
detailed_description:
Kick-start your adventure with this Welcome Pack including the unique Audi R8 Spyder Motorfest Edition and 220,000 Crew Credits.

Crew Credits are the in-game currency to unlock vehicles and new customization items, including:
- Car parts: hood, front bumper, wheels, calipers, mirrors, rocker panel, spoiler, back bumper, interior
- Bike parts: headlight, seat, fairing, rims, swingarm, fork, mirrors, exhaust, rear light
- Vanity parts: smoke, nitro, underglow, window tint, horn, tires, roof
- Avatar parts: hat, helmet, glasses, shirt, hoodie, jacket, trousers, tracksuit, shorts, shoes, gloves, racing suit

short_description: Kick-start your adventure with this Welcome Pack including the unique Audi R8 Spyder Motorfest Edition and 220,000 Crew Credits. Crew Credits are the in-game currency to unlock vehicles and new customization items for your vehicles and your avatar!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
